Hello there, I'm Duane M. Moody.

I'm a Senior Software Engineer. I'm always busy on various projects, usually using Ruby on Rails with Growth Hacking in mind. I am available for you.

I enjoy being busy, started working professionally in 1990, and never stopped since. I convert others to Pivotal Tracker and Agile methods.
